name: The Absorber (itch) (Ahmed Nehad)
description:
This Game For The Goedware Game jam  hope You Enjoy :0

Story :

You are a person with a super power to absorb the appility of the object.

Mission :

Cross the forest.

Movement :

A - D or < - > to move around,

W or ^ or space to jump,

Enter / Return  to Attack.

Very Sorry for the game and no soundes i hoped it to be better but i didnt have time i was very busy :(
